description: Mike Huckabee, the U.S. ambassador to Israel, has lashed out at France’s advocacy for recognition of a Palestinian state ahead of a UN conference aimed at resurrecting the idea of a two-state solution.
title: US envoy says France can ‘carve’ Palestinian state out of Riviera

description: UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres says he is appalled by reports of Palestinian casualties while seeking aid in Gaza.
title: UN chief ‘appalled’ by deaths of Palestinians seeking aid

description: Matthew Miller, the U.S. State Department spokesman under former President Joe Biden, has told UK broadcaster Sky News it is “without a doubt true that Israel has committed war crimes” in Gaza.
title: ‘They knew’: Biden administration official admits Israel committing war crimes

description: The Palestinian Ministry of Health in Gaza says Israeli forces have bombed the Noura al-Kaabi Kidney Dialysis Centre in Beit Lahiya in northern Gaza.
title: Israel destroys North Gaza’s only dialysis center

description: Speaking on the recent killings at GHF’s aid distribution points, the acting director of UNRWA in Gaza has described the situation in the coastal enclave as “horrific”.
title: Gaza reduced to ‘herded animals in pens’: UNRWA official

description: MADRID – On the 36th anniversary of the passing of Imam Ruhollah Khomeini, the central figure of the 1979 Islamic Revolution in Iran, his thought continues to influence not only the political trajectory of the Islamic Republic but also broader debates about the relationship between Islam and politics in the Muslim world.
title: The political legacy of Imam Khomeini

description: TEHRAN – On the afternoon of March 22, 1963, when the agents of the Pahlavi regime stormed the mourning crowd of students at the Fayziyyah Seminary in Qom—who were commemorating the martyrdom of Imam Ja’far al-Sadiq (AS)—and unleashed their full brutality, the atmosphere of terror was so suffocating that even the city’s hospitals dared not admit the wounded from the savage attack.
title: Khomeini’s line endures

description: TEHRAN – One of Imam Khomeini’s most enduring legacies is his pivotal role in placing Palestine firmly back on the world’s map.
title: Imam Khomeini and the occupied Palestine

description: BEIRUT — On the anniversary of the passing of Imam Khomeini (ra), Hezbollah Secretary-General Sheikh Naim Qassem affirmed that “revolutionary Iran—under the leadership of Imam Khomeini—stood steadfastly alongside the Resistance Front to liberate Palestine and Holy al-Quds.”
title: Resistance movements owe everlasting gratitude to Imam Khomeini

description: TEHRAN – The Iranian Artists Forum (IAF) in Tehran will host the play “Kaspar” written by Austrian playwright Peter Handke from June 8.
title: Iranian Artists Forum to stage Peter Handke’s “Kaspar”

description: TEHRAN – The Iranian musician, composer, and pianist Mahin Zarinpanjeh passed away on June 1 in Salman Shahr, Mazandaran Province, at the age of 87.
title: Iranian pianist Mahin Zarinpanjeh passes away at 87

description: TEHRAN – The 2024 documentary “Super/Man: The Christopher Reeve Story” directed by Ian Bonhôte and Peter Ettedgui will be shown at the Andisheh Cultural Center in Tehran on Tuesday.
title: Andisheh Cultural Center to show, review “Super/Man: The Christopher Reeve Story”

description: TEHRAN – On Sunday morning, the unveiling ceremony of the commendation for the book “Ruhollah” from the Leader of the Islamic Revolution, Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei, took place at the Institute for Research and Cultural Studies of the Islamic Revolution in Tehran.
title: Leader’s commendation for “Ruhollah” unveiled

description: TEHRAN – To enhance media diplomacy, Radio Tehran has entered into a strategic collaboration with Russia’s international news agency Sputnik, marking a new chapter in the media engagement between Tehran and Moscow.
title: Radio Tehran and Russia’s Sputnik strengthen media diplomacy through new partnership

description: TEHRAN – A U.S. proposal delivered to Iran via Oman on Saturday calls for an end to Iran’s uranium enrichment—a demand Tehran has consistently rejected, both privately and publicly, since indirect negotiations with Washington over its nuclear program began in April, according to information obtained by the Tehran Times.
title: US proposal asks Iran for ‘zero’ enrichment, Iran preparing rejection

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s Foreign Ministry spokesperson, Esmail Baqaei, has asserted that the Israeli regime is exploiting Iran’s nuclear program as a tool to control U.S. foreign policy in West Asia.
title: ‘Israel exploits nuclear issue to manipulate US foreign policy:’ Iran Foreign Ministry

description: Cairo – The visit of Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi to Cairo marks a highly significant diplomatic moment in a turbulent regional context. It reflects a gradual shift in Egyptian-Iranian relations, which had been frozen for decades due to geopolitical considerations and divergent regional alliances.
title: Cairo and Tehran: Redrawing the lines of regional engagement

description: TEHRAN – In a ceremony at the Fourth Combat Aviation Base in Esfahan on Monday, Iran’s Army (Artesh) Aviation Unit integrated 10 refurbished helicopters into its fleet while celebrating the production of its 1000th indigenized aircraft part.
title: Army Aviation boosts fleet with domestically refurbished helicopters

description: TEHRAN - In an analysis, Hamshahri highlighted a unique diplomatic initiative involving three top Iranian officials, describing it as a sign of Iran’s dynamic and multifaceted approach to foreign policy.
title: The golden triangle of foreign policy

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi has reiterated that any nuclear agreement with Western powers will be contingent upon full recognition of Iran’s right to enrich uranium, stressing that diplomacy remains the preferred route for resolving tensions.
title: No nuclear deal without enrichment rights: Araghchi

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Parliament Speaker Mohammad Baqer Qalibaf says Tehran and Caracas are determined to expand comprehensive bilateral cooperation, calling for a transition from dollar-based transactions to national currencies and the use of the BRICS Pay system in their trade relations.
title: Iran-Venezuela alliance key to facing shared challenges: Qalibaf

description: MUMBAI - Imam Ruhollah Khomeini, who was born in 1900 in the town of Khomeyn, Iran, was a significant figure in the Islamic world, not only as a religious scholar but also a revolutionary leader.
title: Imam Khomeini: A legacy of spiritual leadership and revolution

description: MUMBAI - The 36th death anniversary of Ayatollah Ruhullah Moosavi Khomeini, the founder of the Islamic Republic of Iran, was solemnly commemorated at Kesar Baug Hall in an event titled Yaad-e-Imam-e-Rahil. The program drew a large gathering of attendees from various walks of life, including prominent scholars, students, community members, and women, for whom special arrangements were made.
title: 36th death anniversary of Ayatollah Khomeini commemorated at Kesar Baug Hall, Mumbai

description: TEHRAN – So far, six centers have been launched in the country to provide care for persons with autism, and 10 more centers will be founded by the end of the current Iranian year, March 2026, according to the head of the Welfare Organization.
title: Ten more care centers to be established for autistic persons

description: TEHRAN- During a meeting between Head of Iran’s Trade Promotion Organization (TPO) Mohammad-Ali Dehqan Dehnavi and Tajikistan’s Minister of Industry and New Technologies Sherali Kabi, the two sides emphasized the necessity to expand and facilitate trade cooperation between the two countries.
title: Iran, Tajikistan stress necessity to expand, facilitate bilateral trade

description: TEHRAN – Iran exported 24.6 million tons of non-oil goods worth $8.24 billion in the first two months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 21–May 21), according to the head of the Islamic Republic of Iran Customs Administration (IRICA).
title: Iran’s non-oil exports reach $8.2b in 2 months

description: TEHRAN – Iran is fully prepared to play an active and constructive role in the development of regional transport and logistics, Iranian Minister of Transport and Urban Development Farzaneh Sadegh said at the 13th Meeting of ECO Transport Ministers held in Tehran on Sunday.
title: Tehran signals readiness to boost role in regional transport development

description: TEHRAN – Iran's private sector is ready to boost its investment presence in Iraq, senior officials from the Iran Chamber of Commerce, Industries, Mines and Agriculture (ICCIMA) said during a joint meeting with Iraq’s ambassador to Tehran.
title: Iran launches trade policy council for Iraq as private sector eyes major investments

description: TEHRAN- In a press conference held at Atana Hotel in Tehran on Sunday, the details and goals of Iran's first international blockchain conference, titled deBlock 2025, were clarified.
title: Press conference held on Iran's 1st intl. blockchain conference

description: TEHRAN--The majestic Rayen Citadel in Kerman, a 1,500-year-old adobe fortress standing proudly at the foot of Mount Hezar, echoes the grandeur of ancient Persia.
title: Grandeur of ancient Persia in Rayen Citadel

description: TEHRAN--The Embassy of the Islamic Republic of Iran in Vietnam actively participated in the Hanoi Tourism Festival 2025, which was held by the Hanoi Municipality at the historical complex of "Thang Long Royal Citadel", showcasing the rich culture, authentic art, and Iranian hospitality.
title: Iran takes part in Hanoi Tourism Festival 2025

description: TEHRAN---The third international health tourism confobition (conference and exhibition) of the ECO member countries will be held in Hamedan from June 11 to 13 this year.
title: Hamedan to host health tourism confobition of ECO countries

description: TEHRAN--Lajim Tower is a brick cylindrical tower used as a tomb among the towering trees. It is located in the village of Lajim near Savadkuh in Mazandaran province. The tower was built around 1022 CE during the Bavand dynasty that ruled over the region at the time.
title: Lajim Tower, a brick ode amidst the symphony of the forest in Savadkuh

description: TEHRAN – Hajar Dabbaghi, Iran’s women’s football team forward, has suffered a torn anterior cruciate ligament (ACL) during a national team camp.
title: Women’s football forward Dabbaghi sidelined for months

description: TEHRAN –The Department of Environment (DOE) and the Ministry of Agriculture have signed a memorandum of understanding (MOU) to launch a national plan for empowering local communities to protect and promote the sustainable use of wetlands.
title: National plan to improve wetland conservation via empowering local communities

description: TEHRAN – A total of 127 earthquakes were recorded across the country from May 23 to 30, according to the seismological networks of the Institute of Geophysics of the University of Tehran.
title: Over 125 earthquakes shake Iran in a week

description: TEHRAN – The Sierra Leone Red Cross Society has expressed interest in expanding cooperation with the Iranian Red Crescent Society (IRCS) in the treatment and rehabilitation sectors.
title: Sierra Leone Red Cross seeks to boost ties with Iranian Red Crescent
Spokesman reacts to American article

description: BEIJING- The establishment of the world’s first intergovernmental legal organization dedicated to resolving disputes through mediation—the International Organization for Mediation (IOMed)—represents a transformative milestone in global governance.
title: IOMed: China’s diplomatic masterpiece ushers in a new era of global peace

description: TEHRAN – Mohammad Reza Farzin, Governor of the Central Bank of Iran (CBI), departed for Beijing to participate in the meeting of central bank chiefs from member states of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO) and hold bilateral talks with his counterparts.
title: CBI chief heads to China for SCO summit on financial co-op

description: TEHRAN - Head coach Amir Ghalenoei has announced his 28-man squad for the upcoming 2026 World Cup qualification matches against Qatar and North Korea, as Iran's national football team look to solidify their commanding position atop Group A. Having already secured their berth in the 2026 FIFA World Cup, Team Melli aim to conclude the third round of Asian qualifying on a high note.
title: A glance at Amir Ghalenoei’s Iran
"My Arsalan... Come Home"
"My Asalan... Come Home"

description: TEHRAN — As the 2025 Volleyball Nations League (VNL) approaches, Iran’s men’s national volleyball team enters the competition with renewed energy and ambition under the leadership of Italian head coach Roberto Piazza.
title: A new chapter begins: Piazza’s Iran
